title: Week Ahead, Lakers Early Struggles, Stephen Espinoza Interview | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Week Ahead, Lakers Early Struggles, Stephen Espinoza Interview | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Another week of WHAT'S BURNIN is here as the boys preview the week ahead in the NBA, discuss the Lakers early season struggles, and interview President Of Showtime Sports Stephen Espinoza. Plus, they answer your fan questions. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
